show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Nuclear Roulette
content: Charlene Spretnak speaks with Gar Smith, author of Nuclear Roulette, about the ongoing situation at and flowing out... <!--more--> from the reactors at Fukushima, including the impacts on the West Coast; reactor safety in the US; the international response to Fukushima and to possible similar events elsewhere in the future; poem by Kay Ryan
